title: THe LazyWeb delivers?
summary: Okay... This really is the LazyWeb. I barely mention writing some sort of RDF-based Tinderbox-a-like, and I see a link to Ideagraph on the #rdfig scratchpad .
content:
Okay... This really is the LazyWeb. I barely mention writing some sort of RDF-based Tinderbox-a-like, and I see a link to Ideagraph on the #rdfig scratchpad .

shortname=ooocef

Archived Comments

  • Danny Ayers
    2002-12-15T12:58:09
    hehehe - I hadn't seen the #rdfig chump post, and had only done a very quiet announcement of this release. I wanted to get the source release ready and any deployment bugs fixed first (there doesn't seem to be anything significant on Windows, but OS X is another story...). Anyhow, the source should be available by tomorrow night, I'll make announcements on the blog: http://www.citnames.com/blog
